statements: DELETE FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE awareness_raised = TRUE;
DELETE FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale'
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 100 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM product_data WHERE price <= 50 AND category = 'Electronics'
